alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN NASSAU...EASTERN DUVAL AND SOUTHEASTERN CAMDEN COUNTIES THROUGH 230 PM EDT... At 137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms over Craig Field, or over Unf. A cluster of strong thunderstorms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Marys, Kingsland, Fernandina Beach, Unf, Kings Bay Base, Arlington, Jacksonville Beach, Atlantic Beach, Yulee, and Neptune Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; South Central Duval; Western Duval
